bio: I'm a results-driven Frontend Engineer with 6+ years of experience in developing modern, scalable, and high-performance web applications. My expertise spans TypeScript, React, Next.js, Svelte, and Electron.js, with deep knowledge of functional components, hooks, context API, and state management using Redux, Zustand, and Flux.

I have a proven track record of delivering impactful solutions across healthcare, e-commerce, diamond, stock management, and edtech sectors. I'm an enthusiastic self-learner passionate about emerging JavaScript technologies and optimizing engineering workflows.
Based in Gandhinagar, Gujarat, I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow both professionally and personally.

interests.text: Staying updated on technology and design trends
Reading productivity, tech, and philosophy books
Gardening and maintaining a green lifestyle
